de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api.attributes

Interface Attribute


  • public interface Attribute
    An interface representing an attribute of a controllable mob. Use one of the various methods located at ControllableMobAttributes to retrieve an attribute instance.
    Version:
    v4
    Author:
    Cybran

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean attachModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Attaches a custom modifier to this attribute.
      AttributeModifier[] getAttachedModifiers() 
      AttributeModifier[] getAttachedModifiers(ModifyOperation operation) 
      String getAttributeName() 
      double getBasisValue() 
      double getMaximum() 
      double getMinimum() 
      double getValue() 
      boolean hasModifierAttached(AttributeModifier modifier)
      Checks whether a certain modifier is attached to this attribute.
      void resetAttribute()
      Unattaches all custom modifiers and resets the basis value.
      double resetBasisValue()
      Resets the basis value to the value it had before the entity was put under your control.

      Sets the attribute's basic value.
      void unattachCustomModifiers()
      Unattaches all custom modifiers.

      Unattaches a custom modifier from this attribute.
      void unattachModifiers()

      void unattachNativeModifiers()

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeName

        String getAttributeName()
        Returns:
        the name of this attribute

      • getBasisValue

        double getBasisValue()
        Returns:
        the value of this attribute before any modifiers are applied.

      • setBasisValue

        void setBasisValue(double value)
        Sets the attribute's basic value.
        Parameters:
        value - the raw attribute value

      • resetBasisValue

        double resetBasisValue()
        Resets the basis value to the value it had before the entity was put under your control.
        Returns:
        the restored value

      • getValue

        double getValue()
        Returns:
        the value of this attribute after all modifiers have been applied. The value will never be lower than the minimum value or higher than the maximum value

      • getMinimum

        double getMinimum()
        Returns:
        the lowest value allowed for this attribute

      • getMaximum

        double getMaximum()
        Returns:
        the highest value allowed for this attribute

      • hasModifierAttached

        boolean hasModifierAttached(AttributeModifier modifier)
        Checks whether a certain modifier is attached to this attribute.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the modifier to check for
        Returns:
        true if attached, false otherwise

      • attachModifier

        boolean attachModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
        Attaches a custom modifier to this attribute.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the modifier which shall be attached
        Returns:
        true when the modifier has been successfully attached, false if the modifier has already been attached before

      • unattachModifier

        void unattachModifier(AttributeModifier modifier)
        Unattaches a custom modifier from this attribute.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the modifier which shall be unattached.

      • getAttachedModifiers

        AttributeModifier[] getAttachedModifiers()
        Returns:
        all currently attached modifiers, including native and custom ones.

      • getAttachedModifiers

        AttributeModifier[] getAttachedModifiers(ModifyOperation operation)
        Parameters:
        operation - an operation filter
        Returns:
        all currently attached modifiers of the provided operation

      • unattachModifiers

        void unattachModifiers()
        Unattaches all modifiers, including native and custom ones.

      • unattachCustomModifiers

        void unattachCustomModifiers()
        Unattaches all custom modifiers.

      • unattachNativeModifiers

        void unattachNativeModifiers()
        Unattaches all native modifiers.

      • resetAttribute

        void resetAttribute()
        Unattaches all custom modifiers and resets the basis value.
        See Also:
        unattachCustomModifiers(), resetBasisValue()
